arts.ttl: Freiburg survive late pressure to best resilient Heidenheim
arts.sum: Freiburg secured another hard-fought 1-0 victory over Heidenheim, with Vincenzo Grifo's header proving the difference in a closely contested Bundesliga clash at the Europa-Park Stadion which saw them claim back-to-back Bundesliga wins. Vincenzo Grifo met it with a well-timed run, heading home from close range to give Freiburg a 1-0 lead.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Huge wins for Stuttgart, Freiburg and Union Berlin, goalless draws in Wolfsburg and Mainz
arts.sum: On a dramatic afternoon across the Bundesliga, VfB Stuttgart, Union Berlin and SC Freiburg secured huge wins to get their league form back on track, whilst goalless draws containing Mainz, Augsburg, Wolfsburg and Bayer Leverkusen questioned the respective European and title credentials of Mainz and Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Freiburg’s Jan-Niklas Beste and Eren Dinkçi prepare for story-laden reunion with Heidenheim
arts.sum: Speaking to SC Freiburg TV, current SCF players Eren Dinkçi and Jan-Niklas Beste spoke on what it felt like to face former Bundesliga club 1. FC Heidenheim this weekend.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. Heidenheim preview: Hosts targeting back-to-back victories
arts.sum: Freiburg will be looking to claim a second straight victory when they welcome Heidenheim to the Europa-Park Stadion for Saturday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: SC Freiburg plan solidarity gesture with Ukrainian sister city Lviv in weekend Bundesliga fixture
arts.sum: SC Freiburg are planning a special solidarity gesture with their sister Ukrainian city ahead of this weekend's home fixture against Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Preview: Freiburg vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Freiburg and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
